query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS visa_compliance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  document_type ENUM('visa', 'work_permit', 'iqama', 'passport') NOT NULL,
  document_number VARCHAR(100),
  issue_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  expiry_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('valid', 'expiring_soon', 'expired', 'pending_renewal') DEFAULT 'valid' NOT NULL,
  days_until_expiry INT,
  reminder_sent TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  last_reminder_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  renewal_status ENUM('not_started', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'rejected'),
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX employee_id_idx (employee_id),
  INDEX status_idx (status),
  INDEX expiry_date_idx (expiry_date),
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
command:

  document_type ENUM('visa', 'work_permit', 'iqama', 'passport') NOT NULL,

  status ENUM('valid', 'expiring_soon', 'expired', 'pending_renewal') DEFAULT 'valid' NOT NULL,

  reminder_sent TINYINT DEFAULT 0,
  last_reminder_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  renewal_status ENUM('not_started', 'in_progress', 'completed', 'rejected'),
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX employee_id_idx (employee_id),
  INDEX status_idx (status),
  INDEX expiry_date_idx (expiry_date),
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
)
